name: Death Park (itch)
description:
Made during the Game Dev Party #12, in June 2017 in Lyon, in 2 Days. See more about the Game Dev Party at http://gamedevparty.fr/ .

The theme for this edition was "The first will be the last", which led us to a game where the goal is to lose points, by dying in various ways before your opponents.

Team :

Art  :

Gaëlle Vivier (http://gaellevivier.tumblr.com/)
Yohann Antoine (http://yohann-antoine.tumblr.com/)

Dev :

Youri Gicquel
Aymeric Lambolez
Lilian Cartellier

Commands :

Gamepads : Joystick + "A" button to jump + "X" button to activate power up

Keyboard : Up/Left/Down/Right, Z/Q/S/D, I.J/K/L, with "Up" button to jump and "Down" button to activate power up
